caption.p: Effect of treatment with the extract (200 and 400 mg/kg, p.o.) on acetic acid-induced vascular permeability. The indicator of inflammation is the amount of Evans blue dye in the abdominal cavity. The values are expressed as the means ± S.E.M. (n = 5–7). * p < 0.001 compared to saline group. # p < 0.001 compared to control (acetic acid only treated group).
